original_title: Walang Matigas na Pulis sa Matinik na Misis
overview: Bong Revilla plays Capt. Bartolome “Bart” Renaldo, a tough and honest cop but is very afraid of his wife Gloria (Lani Mercado), who resigned from being a cop to be a plain housewife. And although he is a loyal husband, Bart’s ex-girlfriend Mildred (Plinky Recto) tries so hard to win her back. And now, Bart has a bigger problem with Gloria.
title: Walang Matigas na Pulis sa Matinik na Misis
